data.title: Top 10 movies 1998
data.meta_description: The Thin Red Line. (Terrence Malick) Rushmore. (Wes Anderson) The Truman Show. (Peter Weir) The Big Lebowski. (Joel & Ethan Coen) Happiness. (Todd Solondz) Snake Eyes. (Brian De Palma) Seul contre tous. (I Stand Alone) (Gaspard Noé) Los Amantes del Círculo Polar. (Lovers of the Arctic Circle) (Julio Medem) Saving Private Ryan. (Steven Spielberg) The…
data.text:
The Hi-Lo Country.

(Stephen Frears)

Would not have been misplaced in my top 10 either / Hadden eveneens niet misstaan in mijn top 10:

Central do Brasil. (Central Station) (Walter Salles)

Festen. (The Celebration) (Thomas Vinterberg)

Kanzo Sensei. (Dr. Akagi) (Shohei Imamura)

The General. (John Boorman)

Chan sam ying hung. (A Hero Never Dies) (Johnnie To)

Pleasantville. (Gary Ross)

Pi. (Darren Aronofsky)

Twilight. (Robert Benton)

Lola Rennt. (Run, Lola, Run) (Tom Tykwer)

S. (Guido Henderickx)

Hombres Complicados. (Dominique Deruddere)

Le Bal Masqué. (Julien Vrebos)

L’ennui. (Cédric Kahn)

A Bug’s Life. (John Lasseter, Andrew Stanton)

Crna macka, beli macor. (Black Cat, White Cat) (Emir Kusturica)

Claire Dolan. (Lodge Kerrigan)
